dialogBox.title: Ensure the following before you continue
listItems: You are present in a safe and secure environment
You have at least 10-15 minutes to setup your wallet
You have an active internet connection
The tamper-proof seal of the package is intact
Cypherock will never ask you for your seed phrase nor will it ever ask you to sign a transaction
Cypherock will only email you from cypherock.com. Do not trust any email from any other website domain

userNew.title: I am using Cypherock X1 for the first time
userNew.note: Choose this if you have never used Cypherock X1 before

userExpert.title: I have already used a Cypherock X1
userExpert.note: Choose this if you want to migrate your wallets to a new Cypherock X1. This might be required in case you lost your X1 Vault and one or more of the X1 Cards

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtext: Take some time to review our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
terms.consent: I have read and agree with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

email.invalid: This is not a valid email

password.containUppercase: must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
password.containLowercase: must contain at least 1 lowercase letter

pages.title: From the Main Menu of your X1 Vault, click on "Create Wallet"
Click "Generate New Wallet" on your X1 Vault
Enter a wallet name on your X1 Vault

messageBoxList.info: Make sure that the wallet name is unique to other wallet names on the device

messageBoxList.warning: Wallet name once set cannot be modified. Please set the name accordingly

pages.title: Confirm the wallet name on the X1 Vault
Do you want to setup a PIN for your wallet?

messageBoxList.warning: The PIN once set cannot be changed. You will have to delete the wallet and create again in order to change the PIN

pages.title: Setup a PIN on the X1 Vault

messageBoxList.warning: Make sure you make a backup of your PIN. If you lose it , you lose access to your funds

messageBoxList.warning-white: Skip this step if you are not setting up a PIN

pages.title: Confirm the entered PIN on the X1 Vault

messageBoxList.warning: Remember your PIN, if you lose it, you lose access to your funds. Even Cypherock won't be able to help you recover your assets
Back it up in a safe place

messageBoxList.warning-white: Skip this step if you are not setting up a PIN

pages.title: Tap X1 Cards one by one below the X1 Vault
pages.subtitle: Do not lift until you hear a beep sound

messageBoxList.info: Make sure your X1 Cards belong to the same family
Make sure you tap the X1 Cards in the correct order

pages.title: Congratulations, your wallet is now successfully created
The next time you need to make a transaction, you just need to fetch any one X1 Card along with the X1 Vault
In case you lose your X1 Vault, you can buy a new X1 Vault separately and use it with your old X1 Cards
Important Note

messageBoxList.warning: In case you need to add another wallet, you will need to fetch all of the 4 cards together. In case you want to import your other wallets into Cypherock X1, now is the best time to avoid the future hassle

pages.title: As a next step, keep your X1 Cards safely inside the card sleeves and distribute them into different places. Some examples of the places could be:
bulletList: Homes of your family members or your friends

pages.title: From the Main Menu of your X1 Vault, click on "Create Wallet"
Click "Restore from Seed Phrase" on your X1 Vault
Enter a wallet name on your X1 Vault

messageBoxList.info: Make sure that the wallet name is unique to other wallet names on the device

messageBoxList.warning: Wallet name once set cannot be modified. Please set the name accordingly

pages.title: Confirm the wallet name on the X1 Vault
Do you want to setup a PIN for your wallet?

messageBoxList.warning: The PIN once set cannot be changed. You will have to delete the wallet and create again in order to change the PIN

pages.title: Setup a PIN on the X1 Vault

messageBoxList.warning: Make sure you make a backup of your PIN. If you lose it , you lose access to your funds

messageBoxList.warning-white: Skip this step if you are not setting up a PIN

pages.title: Confirm the entered PIN on the X1 Vault

messageBoxList.warning: Remember your PIN, if you lose it, you lose access to your funds. Even Cypherock won't be able to help you recover your assets
Back it up in a safe place

messageBoxList.warning-white: Skip this step if you are not setting up a PIN

pages.title: Count the number of words of the seed phrase which you are importing and select it on the X1 Vault
Enter the seed phrase on the X1 Vault

messageBoxList.warning: Make sure you do not make spelling mistakes while entering the words on the device. Words like "west" & "nest" are often confusing while reading and needs to be entered correctly

pages.title: Verify the seed phrase that you entered on the X1 Vault
pages.subtitle: Match each and every to successfully import the correct wallet

pages.title: Tap X1 Cards one by one below the X1 Vault
pages.subtitle: Do not lift until you hear a beep sound

messageBoxList.info: Make sure your X1 Cards belong to the same family
Make sure you tap the X1 Cards in the correct order

pages.title: Congratulations, your wallet is now successfully created
The next time you need to make a transaction, you just need to fetch any one X1 Card along with the X1 Vault
In case you lose your X1 Vault, you can buy a new X1 Vault separately and use it with your old X1 Cards
Important Note

messageBoxList.warning: In case you need to add another wallet, you will need to fetch all of the 4 cards together. In case you want to import your other wallets into Cypherock X1, now is the best time to avoid the future hassle

pages.title: As a next step, keep your X1 Cards safely inside the card sleeves and distribute them into different places. Some examples of the places could be:
bulletList: Homes of your family members or your friends

betaNotification.title: CySync Update v2.0.0
betaNotification.description: We have done a major overhaul to the CySync app. The new CySync comes with all your favorite features and much more. Download from https://cypherock.com/get-started **Important** * You won’t lose your funds * After update, you will have to import your accounts again * No new updates to CySync v1 except security update

reminderSetup.title: Reminder setup

reminderInfo.subtitle: What is reminder time?
reminderInfo.subtext: Reminder Time is the interval at which you'll receive a confirmation email from Cypherock to verify your continued well-being. If no response is received within two months of the initial email, the inheritance process will commence and your nominee will receive the recovery instruction email from Cypherock

You can also include the passphrase in this message

syncMobile.title: Sync cySync Mobile App
syncMobile.description: Sync your Accounts with cySync Mobile App through QR code

editAccount.title: Edit Accounts
editAccount.description: Edit the name, preferred currency of the account or remove them from portfolio

toggleWalletOnPortfolio.title: Show/Hide Wallets on the Portfolio
toggleWalletOnPortfolio.description: You can disable a specific wallet from here. it will not be displayed on the portfolio page

currency.title: Preferred currency
currency.description: Choose the currency shown next to your balance and operations

language.title: Display Language
language.description: Set the language for the cySync App

region.title: Region
region.description: Choose your region to update formats of date and time

password.title: Password
password.description: Change or turn off/on password for your cySync App

anayticsAndBugReport.title: Analytics & Bug Report
anayticsAndBugReport.description: Enable analytics & bug reports to help Cypherock improve user experience & to help resolve your issues faster. This includes clicks, page visits, redirections, actions(send, receive, lock etc.), end of page scrolls, (un)installing and app version, number of accounts, crypto assets and operations, session durations, the Cypherock device type and firmware

reset.title: Reset cySync
reset.description: Erase all cysync data stored on your PC, including your accounts, transaction histories and settings. Note that this will not result in loss of assets

update.title: cySync Update
update.description: Automatically download cysync update when available

usb.title: USB Diagnostics
usb.description: Troubleshoot USB connection with the device

transferWallet.title: Transfer Wallet
transferWallet.description: If you ever had a Cypherock X1 and want to transfer your wallets using your cards in case you lost it or any reason whatsoever

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.description: By using cySync you agree to our Terms of Use

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use them

silver.title: Silver
silver.description: Secure your wallet PIN with us and easily recover it if forgotten, ensuring continuous access to your crypto assets

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: Ensure your crypto assets are inherited by loved ones effortlessly, bypassing complex legal restrictions for smooth transfers

video.title: Watch the whole video before you proceed
video.subTitle: The video will help you take the right decisions

selectWallet.title: Select the wallet you want to cover in this plan
selectWallet.subTitle: For setting up additional wallets, individual plans can be created later
selectWallet.tooltip: This wallet is not having a PIN setup, create a new wallet or select a different wallet having PIN setup

walletAuth.title: Follow instructions on the X1 Vault to authenticate the selected wallet
walletAuth.subTitle: Authenticating the wallet

actions.tapCard: Enter PIN and tap any one card

messageBox.warning: Lift your card after 3 beep sounds

error.title: Wallet Authentication failed
error.subtext: We could not authenticate the selected wallet

messageBox.warning: This usually happens when the wallets in the Cysync and the device are not in sync. Sync the wallets between the Cysync and the device or choose a different wallet

emailField.label: Primary Email
emailField.tooltip: Enter the email on which you want to receive all reminder emails

select.title: How many nominees do you want?
select.subtitle: You can have up to 2 nominees for this will
select.tooltip:
In case if you select two nominees then the 2nd nominee will receive the recovery email three months after the 1st nominee receives it
Note - Both nominees will receive the same recovery email and same message written by you on the CySync app

options.descOne: Select if you want to have only one nominee
options.descTwo: Select if you want to have two nominees

first.title: Add first nominee
first.warning: Make sure you give a card to your nominee
first.tooltip: Your Nominee will receive recovery instructions on this email

second.title: Add second nominee
second.warning: Make sure you give a card to your second nominee

confirm.title: Do you want to verify nominee emails?
confirm.subtext: An OTP will be sent to the provided emails. If you do not want to inform the nominee about this plan, you can skip verification of emails.
confirm.warning: Make sure you provide correct emails.

select.title: Do you want to have an executor for this will?
select.subtext: The executor will help the nominee to recover funds
select.tooltip:
An executor/helper can be someone you trust who does not have any financial stake but can be assigned as a helper to the nominee for funds recovery
The executor will receive the email on the same time as the nominee.

one.desc: A tech savvy person whom you trust

two.desc: If your nominees are tech savvy

executorDetails.title: Add executor
executorDetails.tooltip: Executor will receive instructions  to help nominee on this email

radio.label: Choose a nominee to link with executor
radio.tooltip:
Select the nominee you want to link with the executor. If you choose Nominee 1 then the executor will receive their email written by you on same time as Nominee 1.

If you choose Nominee 2 then the executor will receive their email written by you on same time as Nominee 2 i.e, 3 months after Nominee 1.

tutorial.title: Watch the whole video before you proceed further
tutorial.subtext: How to write the final messages

nominee.title: Draft the final message for the nominee
nominee.subtitle: The nominee messages will be end-to-end encrypted
nominee.tooltip: End-to-end encryption keeps your messages between you and the nominee you choose. Not even Cypherock can read them

locationField.label: Card Location* & Passphrase
locationField.tooltip:
Write down the location of another card for the nominee to fetch. Nominee will only be able to recover crypto assets after getting another card. Remember this card should be different than the card(s) you may have given to your nominee(s).
You can also include the passphrase in this message.

personalMessage.label: Personal Message*
personalMessage.tooltip: This can include your will/message for the nominee and other important pieces of information that you may want your nominee to know such as your crypto exchange account details, coins you have amongst others.

messageBox.warning: Make sure you describe the card's location clearly for the nominee

executor.title: Add a message for the executor
executor.subtitle: Please note that the message to the executor is not encrypted
executor.tooltip: This message will be received by the executor in case recovery is triggered, it's recommended to NOT add any critical information here

summary.title: Summary
summary.subtitle: Please verify all the details before it gets encrypted with the device

device.subtext: Lift your card after 2 beep sounds
device.tooltip: Tap any one X1 card below the X1 device to encrypt the message and do not remove the card until you hear 2 beep sounds
